What is an AI Agent?

An AI agent is a smart program that can make decisions, carry out jobs, and learn from experience. It works on rules, goals, or learning models. These agents are not just chatbots—they can be thinkers, doers, or helpers.

There are many types:

Reactive agents:
respond without memory

Learning agents:
get smarter over time

Collaborative agents:
work in groups

Autonomous agents:
work without humans

At Deligence, we build AI agents tailored to your business goals—whether you need a reactive, learning, or autonomous system. As your trusted AI agent development services, we help you choose the best fit.

Traditional Software vs AI Agents: The Game-Changing Difference

TRADITIONAL SOFTWARE:

AI AGENTS:

  • Follow strict rules

  • Can't learn/adapt

  • Manual updates

  • Limited connections

  • Static responses

  • Learn from data

  • Makes smart choices

  • Real-time decisions

  • Better connections

  • Adapts and improves

Our AI Agent Development Services

  • Custom AI Chatbots
    We build chatbots that talk just like humans. They work on websites, apps, or even in stores. Great for customer service, help desks, and more.

  • Task Automation Agents
    These AI agents take care of boring or repeated tasks like sending emails, scheduling meetings, or filling out forms.

  • Voice-Powered Agents
    Our AI agents can listen and talk. They work with Alexa, Siri, and other voice systems.

  • AI Agents for Business Data
    Need help understanding all your business data? These agents find useful patterns and make smart suggestions.

  • Multi-Agent Systems
    We create teams of AI agents that work together. For example, one agent talks to people, another tracks orders, and another handles problems.

Why Choose Deligence as Your AI Agent Development Company

Why choose us? Here are the big wins:

  • Work Faster – AI agents handle jobs instantly.

  • Available 24/7 – No breaks. Always ready.

  • Save Money – You need fewer workers for simple tasks.

  • Better Service – Customers get fast, friendly help.

  • Smart Decisions – Our agents look at data and give advice.

  • Custom Fit – We build the agent exactly how you need it.

  • Flexible Growth – AI agents can scale as your business grows.

How We Develop Intelligent AI Agents

We use a simple but powerful method to build your AI agent:

Learn About Your Needs

We talk to you about your business and what the AI should do.

Plan the Agent's Skills

We decide what the AI agent needs to know and how it should act.

Build the Brain

We train the AI using smart models and your data.

Test Everything

We make sure the agent works perfectly before launch.

Launch and Support

Your AI goes live—and we keep helping if you need updates or fixes.

Tools & Technologies We Use

We use the best tools in the industry to build smart, reliable AI agents for your business. Our tech stack includes:

  • RetellAI, Vapi, and Synthflow – for building voice-powered AI agents that sound natural.

  • Make.com, Zapier, and N8N – to connect your AI agents with other tools and automate workflows.

  • Webhooks and JSON – so your agent can talk to other systems in real-time.

  • Pinecone – to give agents memory and fast access to information.

  • Airtable, GoHighLevel, Monday.com, HubSpot, and Zendesk – to help AI agents manage your sales, support, and CRM data.

  • OpenAI, ChatGPT (GPT-4), LangChain, and Hugging Face – for powerful AI brains that can think, understand, and chat like humans.

  • Node.js and Python – to code smart logic behind every agent.

  • MongoDB – to safely store and manage all your data.

Industries We Serve

Our AI agent development services work for many kinds of businesses:

  • E-commerce – Smart shopping assistants, product Q&A

  • Education – AI tutors and student help desks

  • Finance – Bill reminders, account help agents
  • Real Estate – Virtual property guides
  • Travel – Booking helpers and travel chatbots
  • Retail – In-store assistance and inventory bots
  • Logistics – AI agents that track deliveries and solve route issues

Our Custom AI Agent Development Projects

AI Social Media Agent

Smart Automation for Faster, Better Content

Managing social media was eating up our client's time with manual posting, approvals, and trend monitoring. We built an AI agent that handles everything automatically—from content creation and visual design to approval workflows and multi-platform publishing.

Results: Posts go live in minutes instead of days, with professional content that stays on-brand while saving hours of manual work.

Key Features:

– Creates unique posts for Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and more
– Designs matching graphics and visuals
– Monitors news and industry trends for timely content
– Supports multiple languages for global audiences
– Manages approvals through Google Sheets integration

AI Sales Training Chatbot

Practice Sales Conversations with Voice & Text

We built an AI-powered training system that lets sales teams practice realistic scenarios without live calls or lengthy meetings. Originally developed with OpenAI and VectorShift, we rebuilt it using OpenAI and Next.js for maximum flexibility.

Impact: Teams can practice anytime, get immediate feedback, and improve their skills through realistic AI-powered scenarios.

Key Features:

– Creates unique posts for Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and more
– Designs matching graphics and visuals
– Monitors news and industry trends for timely content
– Supports multiple languages for global audiences
– Manages approvals through Google Sheets integration

AI Voice Calling & Automation System

Smart Lead Conversations Without Manual Work

This system combines AI voice technology with smart automation to handle lead outreach completely hands-free. Using Retell.ai for natural conversations and Make.com for workflow automation.

Benefits: Real-time calling and updates, consistent follow-up process, and easy scaling without additional staff.

Key Features:

– AI agent calls leads with professional, natural conversation
– Gathers information and qualifies prospects
– Automatically updates CRM/Google Sheets
– Sends follow-up SMS via Twilio
– Alerts sales team for hot leads

AI Cold Calling for Real Estate

Automated Property Lead Generation

Built for a real estate investment company targeting mobile home parks nationwide. The system makes outbound calls, qualifies properties, and routes serious leads to human agents

Technology Stack: Retell.ai for voice AI, Make for automation, Google Sheets for lead management, and Twilio for messaging and call transfers.
Results: Reaches hundreds of leads efficiently, collects quality property data, and delivers qualified prospects to the sales team.

Key Features:

– Calls property owners automatically
– Asks qualifying questions (lot count, occupancy, pricing, timeline)
– Handles basic objections professionally
– Transfers hot leads to live agents in real-time
– Manages follow-ups and scheduling automaticallyGG

Getting Started: Your First AI Agent

Starting with AI might sound tricky, but we make it simple. Here's what it's like to work with our AI agent development Services:

Let's Talk

We start by learning about your business. What do you want the AI to do? What problems do you want to solve?

Choose the Right Agent

Next, we recommend the best type of AI agent. It could be a chatbot, a voice bot, or even a full system with multiple smart parts.

Build and Train

We create your AI agent using your data and the latest AI tools. Then we teach it how to do its job.

Test and Improve

We check the AI to make sure it works great. You get to test it too, and we'll make changes until it's perfect.

Go Live!

Once everything is ready, we launch your AI agent. You'll get full support, updates, and training.

Our goal is to make AI simple, helpful, and powerful for your business. Whether you're a startup or a big company, we'll guide you every step of the way.
Want to get started? It's easier than you think.

Let's Build Something Smart Together

Are you ready to make your business smarter? Let's build an AI agent that works for you. Contact us today and get started with a top AI agent development Services.

Frequently Ask Questions (FAQs)

Which company is making AI agents?

Many tech companies are making AI agents. Some big ones are OpenAI, Google, Meta, Microsoft, and Amazon. But smaller AI agent development companies (like ours!) i.e Deligence Technologies  build custom agents for businesses too.

How can I build my own AI agent?

You need the right tools like ChatGPT or LangChain, some data, and a clear goal. If you don't code, you can work with an AI agent development company to build one for you.

How to make money from AI agents?

You can sell AI agents, offer them as a service, or use them to improve your business (like saving costs or growing sales). Some people even sell chatbots in app stores or use them in online stores.

How much does it cost to build an AI agent?

 It depends! Simple agents may cost a few thousand dollars. Bigger or smarter ones cost more. We offer different packages to fit different budgets.

Can I sell AI agents?

Yes, if you build an AI agent or have rights to one, you can sell it to others—just like selling software or apps.

Can I create an AI of myself?

Yes, it's possible! You can create an AI that talks like you or answers questions the way you would. It uses your voice, words, or writing style.

What do AI developers do?

 They teach computers how to understand, talk, think, and solve problems. They build programs that make smart choices using data.

What is the main goal of AI?

 The goal of AI is to help machines think and act smart—so they can help people work, learn, and solve real-world problems faster.
